SEARCH
Package Control

Class UserControl

java.lang.Object
Control.UserControl
public class UserControl extends Object
Controls user management operations performed by Career Center Staff. Handles approval and rejection of company representative registrations. Career staff use this controller to authorize new company representatives to access the system.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Allen

  • Method Details

    • getPendingCompanyRepList

      public List<String> getPendingCompanyRepList()
      Gets a list of all pending company representative registrations. Used by career center staff to review and approve/reject new registrations.
      Returns:
      formatted list of pending registrations with ID, name, company, and department
